import React, { Component } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar' import ScanSheet from '../ScanSheetLabels.PNG' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faGithub, faLinkedin, faInstagram } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' /*This is the home page and makes use of the Navbar, homeNavConatiner, homeStatsContainer and TitleContainer components */ class AboutMe extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { history: this.props.history } } render() { return (

What you get with MenuView

  • An Online menu, see examples.
  • Contactless Scan Sheet.
  • Contactless "Tap Tags".




What are Scan Sheets?

These are the A5 size sheets provided by us which will be placed at every table. This sheet will contain a QR code and a tap tag which link smartphones to the online menu. The sheet is fully customisable to fit your businesses aesthetic.





What are Tap Tags?

Tap Tags link smart phones to the online menu simply by tapping a users smarthphone off the tag. It does this using NFC technology, the same technology used in contactless credit cards.

Scan Sheet

) } } export default AboutMe
